name: Idle Champions: Aasimar Glitch Penelope Theme Pack
summary: In this pack: Unlocks the Champion Penelope (if you don't already have them) Aasimar Glitch Penelope Skin An Exclusive Familiar An Epic Feat for Penelope 1 Epic Potion of the Gem Hunter 16 Gold Penelope Chests with 2 Guaranteed Shiny Equipment Cards
